website_summaries.verdict: One of the simplest ways to lift heavy objects without a dedicated sling or harness.
pros: Strap features 2 large handles that are ergonomically shaped for a comfortable and secure grip
Strap can be positioned in tandem with other lifting aids for the best results
cons: The single strap can be difficult to use solo
Best used in tandem with other traps

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, if you buy two
customer_reviews.text: They aren't as easy to use solo as they look. You have to be very careful with lopsided loads by yourself. I've dropped a couple of things. But that being said, I highly recommend that you buy two and have someone help, because I can't think of anything in the house except maybe the refrigerator, that me and my girlfriend can't move ourselves. Up until now moving is hard because its bulky and it's tough to pick up. Most furniture etc is not all that heavy if you can get a good hand hold. We've moved a king sized mattress, a double wall oven, washer and dryer, a huge sideboard and many other items with these.
customer_reviews.author: R Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up A/Cs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help install A/C's. Picking up a unit from the ground and hauling it to window level is hard. With the strap, you don't have to bend as far down, so to me that's important. So far haven't found any other uses but it did what I asked for it so that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: PierrefromBayRidge

customer_reviews.title: My new must have gardening tool!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer for me in the garden! It’s helping me to move things in the garden (like this bag of mulch) that I never felt like I could safely move before by myself.
customer_reviews.author: InTheGarden

customer_reviews.title: great idea
customer_reviews.text: These were a great help in moving back after Hurricane Harvey. The put a handle on your load and allow you to carry multiple boxes at once. The worked great for dressers. They were better than nothing for mattresses, but the mattress still flopped around and out of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Landle to help move heavy items around the house when my husband isn't home to help me. I've been able to move heavy items around without dragging them on the floor or hurting myself in the process. The handles make it easy to grip awkward items and the strap creates a consistent weight distribution so I can move things quickly and efficiently. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Foster

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to make it easier to move some awkward items by giving us handles to hold and by keeping the center of gravity low. They are easy to adjust and they work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Ungar

customer_reviews.title: Not as efficient as described.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable length is too short and the handle is not ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: SBAies

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool That's Worth Adding in Your Tool Box.
customer_reviews.text: This lifting strap can be used in a lot of application but mostly big boxes, appliances, & furniture. It prevents you from stooping too much that could damage your back. Remember, lift with your legs. I used to bear hug an empty 50 gallon water heater. Now, it is a lot easier lifting with this strap without the unit trying to slip-out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly heavy
customer_reviews.text: Have not actually used, so can't give accurate rating. We got this during the time of covid to help our college daughter move into her dorm with no family helpers. She has to fly with this, her suitcase and a couple of bulky boxes to her college. We thought this would help when she gets there to schlep the boxes up to the 3rd floor. But, the Landle is surprisingly heavy. This could be a problem as we try to keep the weight of her baggage under control. Considering that the virus may end up closing the college campus anyway and then she has to turn around and move back, not sure we will keep this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eckford

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Easy to Use!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase. It is compact, easy to use, and a well-made tool for everyone. The strap is high quality and wide enough to prevent items from spilling. The strong handles are comfortable for men and women and the adjustable slide is great to move items of all shapes and sizes. Thank you for a very useful product and will recommend to friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good on stairs
customer_reviews.text: Do not use if you have to carry things over stairs. It only stays put on the flatest ground.
customer_reviews.author: aubemstie

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Adjustable, Great Handles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a specific task, and works great: very strong straps are easily adjustable and have strong, easy to hold handles.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbobkk

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Not as useful as I was hoping. I move my entire house hold from D.C. to RI. I think I used this twice, and it was awkward for me to use. If you don’t have a dolly, buy that first.
customer_reviews.author: N. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Just "okay"
customer_reviews.text: For boxes this was not extremely helpful. Pros: -Does provide better hand grip -Does improve angle to hold items Cons: -Strap constantly slips and is not relaiable -Items move and do not provide confidence that while moving it wont be fall -Strap length shifts while in use. Summary: While helpful in a pinch, it doesnt inspire confidence and would not recommend for anything "important".
customer_reviews.author: Sup3rt4891

customer_reviews.title: Great for yard work and garden projects
customer_reviews.text: Bought the landle for yard work and have been pleased! Great tool for carrying bulky and heavy items up and down steps or across my backyard which a dolly or cart cannot do because the yard is uneven. Recommended to my friends and recommend to you as well
customer_reviews.author: Nana gardener

customer_reviews.title: ripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these straps to move a heavy object with two friends. When we were done I noticed this tear in the fabric on one of them. This may have happened when we dragged instead of lifted the item for a few feet over a concrete floor so I am still giving the product an average rating, but I don't that short drag should have ripped it so easily. The worst part is I am four days out of my return window and Amazon simply won't let you talk to the seller since Amazon handled the shipping. I am pretty sure the seller would replace this if they had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: The product helps a lot in lifting things, especially if you are older. The service was very good as it came quickly and was ready to put me to work.
customer_reviews.author: Beelady

customer_reviews.title: Save your $.  Use a rope.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these... basically a waste of $40. My purpose was to help move a mattress. I suppose they were slightly better than just picking it up with our hands. Centering them so we both had even grips was challenging. Any other application for which this might be used, I believe a rope would do the trick so I'd never recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Package

customer_reviews.title: Heave - Ho With Ease
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I purchased two of these to help with my move from Michigan to Tennessee. It made moving boxes onto the truck so much more efficient even the huge mattress that we had to move. If you're in a crazy moving state of Mind get this great product to ease the lifting and lifting and lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Donna deWitt-Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Very handy as a one person lift aid.
customer_reviews.text: What a simple but logical solution to moving/lifting certain objects alone. Like carrying heavy storage containers up a stairway or even a ladder. Oddly I must have purchased a smaller knockoff at some point that works well for smaller lifts. Good idea for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Genius design! My husband and I are both under 5’5” and we used these to move four really heavy queen size beds up and down two steep flights of stairs. We couldn’t have done it without these Landles. Would highly recommend these for moving any kind of furniture, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to work with. Help with carrying Mattresses and box spring. Doesnt work with carrying boxes or any other things with one person carrying. Only useful for carrying mattresss
customer_reviews.author: SAMMIE

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool. Adjustable. Sturdy. Saved my hands.
customer_reviews.text: I lift big boxes with these 24” x 19” x 19”. They weigh 35-40 pounds. This tool saves the joints in my hand from swelling up painfully at night from the strain of gripping the box edges. It’s bright handles make finding it easy in the warehouse. It is made in the USA. I’m going to buy 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mastenbrook

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good idea, but didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it would lift and awkward load, e.g.. My husband’s wheelchair into the back of my SUV. That does not work. There’s just no good way to load it into the strap and make it work.
customer_reviews.author: KansasMom411

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility
customer_reviews.text: 2 adults used this Landle to put a 60 lb jack in the back of a very tall pickup. WE ARE IMPRESSED!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomics lacking
customer_reviews.text: This totally didn’t work for me and was so awkward to hold and use that I was afraid I’d drop it on my foot. I’m pretty strong and feel capable of doing much but the ergonomics were horrible. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Dan

customer_reviews.title: The handy Landle is very dandy
customer_reviews.text: Using this to move a heavy musical instrument and it's working out quite well. Bought a 2nd one to have to move furniture. Reasonable buy at $20. Hope they don't raise the price like they seemed to try to do.
customer_reviews.author: Harpsichord Man

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bring a 40 pound of rock salt into my garage. It's a durable strap.
customer_reviews.author: TrudyO

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well when carrying a small, but heavy object. Plan to order a second one for moving larger objects.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Increased safety and production
customer_reviews.text: The landle was great for me. Being a bit older, I am afraid to carry boxes with two hands when descending steps. With the landle, I was able to carry more and still have one hand available to hold the rail - increased safety and production.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when you need help
customer_reviews.text: We used Moving strap to help lift the mattress to turn it. It was so much easier to lift the mattress, nice to have something to hold on to. Performed the task in less time and very to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Adjust
customer_reviews.text: We've only used these a few times and they seemed to work on medium weight items. Heavier things might require a back brace strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Our movers love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my moving crew and everyone raved about them! They are super durable and easy to use. Makes lifting so very much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Van Acker

customer_reviews.title: Good strap but can be better
customer_reviews.text: It was very useful to carry boxes down the stairs. Giving a 4 because of the hard plastic handle which was little difficult to carry if the boxes very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Revathy Muthu

customer_reviews.title: Help move my washing machine.
customer_reviews.text: The product helps me move my washing machine which jiggles with a full load back into line with my dryer. Glad I got the Landle.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable moving straps
customer_reviews.text: Thes straps performed as stated. Takes two people to move heavy items.. Highly recommend these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: cmsrobert

customer_reviews.title: makes lifting heavy things safe and easy
customer_reviews.text: I used the Landle for moving 2 air conditioners to the basement. It was so much easier this year with the Landle. And safer on the back. Good product. Will use it for any heavy lifting from now on.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: EASY to CARRY
customer_reviews.text: I often sell books and movies. The boxes can be bulky and heavy. I walk with a cane due to a knee injury. This Landle was perfect for carrying a 30 pound box of books to the post office. I will get a lot of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: New Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and easy to use When I have to move things like boxes or summer outdoor cushions it’s so handy
customer_reviews.author: Donna legendre

product_meta.title: The Landle Adjustable Moving and Lifting Straps for Furniture, Boxes, Mattress, Construction Materials, or Other Heavy, Bulky, or Awkward Objects, Single or Two Person Carrying, 1 Strap Included
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR SAFETY Developed by physical therapists, The Landle’s patented, ergonomic design helps reduce the risk of injury by employing proper body mechanics and leverage to make lifting objects safer and easier.

LIFTS A RANGE OF ITEMS From moving furniture, and mattresses, to carrying smaller items like firewood, mulch or boxes, The Landle easily lifts it all. Its versatility makes it great for moving, but also perfect for working in the yard, around the house or in the office.

EASY LIFTING HANDLE Unlike other lifting and moving equipment that dig into your forearm, shoulder or back, this strap provides the function and convenience of handles to any object, making your move faster and smoother.

ADJUSTABLE STRAP The Landle’s extra wide 6 inch strap is simple and easy to use, adjusting quickly from 3 feet up to 6 feet long allowing the user to lift items weighing up to 800 lbs. from their desired height.

ONE OR TWO PERSON LIFT There's no need for a dolly, hand truck, a complicated harness, or uncomfortable straps. The Landle can be used by one person or two people, so even when you don’t have an extra hand, you can still lift that heavy object on your own. Packaging may vary.
